content: #CATENA_Network#CMCX_CoinDear CORE MultiChain Community,It is our absolute honor and pleasure to announce the start of the first step towards the launch of the Mainnet. Now, users can register and submit their applications through the Validator Portal website to participate in the Validator program, either as Full Validator or Staked Delegator. We encourage our user community to register, submit their applications, and be a part of the very first pillar builders of the CORE Multichain Network.Please visit:https://operators.coremultichain.com/Feel free to ask any question. Your doubts will be gladly clarified.TOGETHER WE GROW=======================Get rewarded for contributing to CORE's futureBy participating in CORE staking, individuals and businesses can not only earn CMCX rewards but also become a crucial part of the network's backbone. Staking is a vital pillar of CORE's roadmap, which includes upgrading the network's scalability, security, and sustainability. Running a validator node is a major opportunity that CORE staking offers to both institutions and individuals. As the backbone of CORE's Proof-of-Stake future, validators will play a crucial role in securing billions of dollars in the booming industry of Decentralized Finance (DeFi). Joining CORE staking is a smart and lucrative way to contribute to the network's growth and success.=======================CORE MultiChain Media:Web (https://coremultichain.com/)Wallet Web (https://wallet.coremultichain.com/)Twitter (https://twitter.com/COREMultichain)YouTube (https://www.youtube.com/c/coremultichain)TG Channel (https://t.me/COREMultiChain)TG Chat (https://t.me/coremultichaingroup)Github (https://github.com/COREMultichain)LinkedIn (https://www.linkedin.com/company/coremultichain/)Instagram (https://www.instagram.com/coremultichain/)========================
